summary:
I am a died-in-the-wool project manager with many years in the computer industry, initially as a Systems Programmer, then years as a Business Analyst to becoming a Project and Programme Manager. I have had the prime responsibility for all budget, functional and resourcing aspects in the implementation of small (€10.000) to very large (€45M), multi-cultural and multi-disciplined international IT projects. I have had extensive experience in the management of assignments within charitable organisations and in the telecom, financial, insurance, oil and product sectors using Oracle and Salesforce solutions. I was the Operations Director for the Capgemini Slovakia office responsible for the +100 consulting team and in the last 12 years for very large projects delivered within eastern Europe. I have worked in the Middle East, central and eastern Europe and in the last 2 years also in Kenya. I am fluent in English, Dutch and German.

My main strength is in managing (or the correction of) the processes necessary for the successful implementation of IT solutions.  I have a track record for identifying and successfully managing the resolution of problems in projects that have directional or financial problems. I am the certified IT Professional that has had the experience to initiate, manage, correct and/or complete multi disciplined programs and projects. I am also a facilitator for the rapid initiation of IT projects, typically within a week. And I am a Certified Agile SCRUM Master with experience in using Salesforce and JIRA.

profile_positions.description: Managing a team of Project Managers, who have the responsibility for completely all existing and succesfully implementing new IT based solutions, for Manpower, Experis, Jefferson Wells and Talent Solutions.

profile_positions.description: Managing the implementation of Salesforce for several clients in Kenya. Also supporting these clients in building up and improving their strategic IT planning capabilities, the implementation and use of RACI models and associated project management, Agile Scrum and internal scope requirements, User Story definitions and associated user based processes.
profile_positions.title: Delivery and Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
My role as Delivery Manager was in overseeing all large Salesforce implementations and mentoring junior project managers and Lead Consultants in the profit and non-profit industry sectors. Skilled in Prince II, waterfall, Agile SCRUM and Adaptive Delivery Methodology (ADM) and methodologies, together with the lessons learnt from past projects enabled me to guide all projects to their successful conclusions.
I was also the project manager for the implementation of Salesforce implementations at several Charity organisations (e.g. EO, Light for the World, Leprazending, MamaCash, Stichting Timon, Stichting Vluchteling, Vfonds, Nederlands Letterenfonds) and non-charity organisations (e.g. VBO Makelaars, VNO-NCW) with my teams of developers, technical, migration and change management experts. All projects were delivered either on or ahead of schedule, with extra functionality and under budget. In many cases follow-up projects were requested to address additional functionality.
profile_positions.title: Delivery and Project Manager

profile_positions.description: In my role as project manager, I assisted in the correction of several Eastern Europe multi-million IT projects, either on location or from the Netherlands. I gave mentor support to junior project managers implementing standard package and client scoped requirements. I was also the instigator for the "rapid initiation" of 2 large IT projects in Prague, typically within a week, where these would normally need several weeks. I was also instrumental in setting up the necessary contracts for using Portugese and Indian development resources.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project and Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was a Certified Enterprise Engagement Manager and a member of the elite Capgemini Club d'Experts of Global Senior Project and Program Managers. I had many successful assignments including the auditing, initiation, integration, management and/or correction of complex international Fixed Price bespoke and package-based implementation solutions. 
The projects and programs for which I had responsibility were in several business industries including the Financial, Oil and Telecommunications sectors. These were primarily in NL, Central and Eastern Europe. I was then given the responsibility as the Chief Operations Officer for Capgemini Slovakia and therefore for the success of the operations of that unit, it's consulting personnel and all IT projects. I was also responsible for signing off all major projects in Eastern Europe and advisor to the use of "offshore" resources. And I was part of the Capgemini Global team for creating a rapid initiation of large IT projects. 
I conducted Audits for major Capgemini Projects in NL and Central Europe and I was an active member of Capgemini's International "Flying Squad" (a specialised fast reaction audit team set up to review and advise on problematic IT projects).
